import React, { Component } from 'react'; import { formSubmitX,formSubmitY,formSubmitZ } from './DataSave'; class DataInput extends Component { componentDidMount(){ //componentDidMount ile bileşenler DOM'a eklendikten sonra aşağıdaki kod satırları çalışır hale geldi. // Save Value of the Axis let xinputDOM=document.querySelector("#axis") xinputDOM.addEventListener("submit", formSubmitX) let yinputDOM=document.querySelector("#axis") yinputDOM.addEventListener("submit", formSubmitY) let zinputDOM=document.querySelector("#axis") zinputDOM.addEventListener("submit", formSubmitZ) } render() { return (

Input Cordinate

) } } export default DataInput;
